evaluations.name: Trip Cancellation
evaluations.justification: The customer explicitly requested coverage for trip cancellation. The agent confirmed this requirement and probed for pre-existing conditions, which is a common exclusion.
evaluations.customer_quote: [16] Customer: Need cover if trip is cancelled.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent confirmed the requirement and asked a relevant follow-up question about pre-existing conditions.
evaluations.agent_quote: [17] Agent: Alright, so cover for trip cancellation... [19] Agent: Any pre-existing medical conditions we should be aware of...?

evaluations.name: Medical Coverage
evaluations.justification: The customer explicitly requested coverage for medical emergencies. The agent confirmed this and appropriately probed for pre-existing conditions and special medical equipment.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent confirmed the requirement and asked relevant clarifying questions about pre-existing conditions and medical equipment.
evaluations.agent_quote: [17] Agent: ...medical emergencies... [19] Agent: Any pre-existing medical conditions we should be aware of...? [21] Agent: And will you be traveling with any special medical equipment...?

evaluations.name: Lost/Damaged Luggage
evaluations.justification: The customer explicitly requested coverage for lost or damaged luggage. The agent confirmed this requirement.
evaluations.customer_quote: [16] Customer: Also if luggage is lost or damaged.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent confirmed the customer's requirement for luggage coverage.

evaluations.name: Travel Delays
evaluations.justification: The customer explicitly requested coverage for extra costs due to flight delays. The agent confirmed this requirement.
evaluations.customer_quote: [16] Customer: Flight delays causing extra cost.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent confirmed the customer's requirement for travel delay coverage.

evaluations.name: Sports and Adventure Activities
evaluations.justification: The agent proactively asked if the customer planned any specific activities like skiing or scuba diving. The customer confirmed they did not, clarifying this coverage was not needed.
evaluations.customer_quote: [14] Customer: No special activities planned. Just sightseeing.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent proactively probed for the need for sports/adventure coverage, which is good practice.
evaluations.agent_quote: [13] Agent: Are there any specific activities you plan to participate in during your trip, like skiing or scuba diving?

evaluations.name: Pet Accommodation Costs (Scenario Specific)
evaluations.justification: The customer explicitly stated the scenario-specific requirement for coverage for pet hotel costs if their return was delayed. The agent confirmed understanding of this specific need.
evaluations.customer_quote: [24] Customer: Yes. Need cover for pet hotel costs if return flight to Singapore is delayed. Have a cat.
evaluations.agent_performance_justification: The agent acknowledged and confirmed the specific requirement volunteered by the customer after a general prompt.
evaluations.agent_quote: [25] Agent: Okay, cover for additional pet accommodation costs due to travel delay on return. Noted.

summary.overall_assessment: The agent successfully gathered information on all standard coverage types mentioned by the customer and proactively checked for sports/adventure activities. The agent also effectively probed for relevant details like pre-existing conditions and captured the scenario-specific requirement regarding pet accommodation costs. The agent confirmed all gathered requirements in a clear summary at the end. Overall, a thorough and effective information gathering process.
